original_text: And Hezekiah gave him all the silver that was found in the house of the Lord, and in the treasures of the king's house.
korean_text: 히스기야가 이에 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 곳간에 있는 은을 다 주었고

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah gave him all the silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 히스기야는 그에게 모든 은을 주었는데

sentences.original_text: that was found in the house of the Lord
and in the treasures of the king's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 집 보물에 있던 은을
